Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2012 12:59AM - edited Jul 14, 2012 01:02AM by ElizabethK Hi Rosie- Hope you find all the information on this site you need to make decisions about your situation. You've done a great thing by reaching out. I had a lump that felt like it was part of my rib as well. It was located unusually high in my chest. Dr.s were not concerned..so..I blew it off for 4 years. It started out hard and changed over time in that it grew in size, attached to the skin, and chest wall. It turned out it was cancer. I'm way past blaming myself for not being more assertive with my concerns...but...If I had to do it again I would have stayed on top of it and pushed for more information and I biopsy. Best wishes.
Posts.Title: found a lump, want to hear/read about others experience rosie15 rosie15
